name: SpaceFinder
description:
Hello everyone,

I only started to learn about coding and game developement a couple months ago and this is my first game.

I started working on this small project for the Beginners Circle Jam#3, I just wanted to challenge my self to create a full game, and push myself to learn more about the engine I'm using(Godot).

As stated on the Jam rules I made all by myself the pixel art, bg, coding etc(I have to say it art was tough, but i'm pretty happy with some of the planets)

The music used as the bgm was made by Tallbeard Studios

The sound effects came from free packs made by Kronbits and SubSpaceAudio

I'll be happy with any feedback i can get and if you find any bugs let me know.
